column8: The source of the information is "Windy.com", but even if the body was burned, "Windy.com" does not show real-time sulfur dioxide.

column2: In two videos of a YouTube channel it is said that in Ibagué there are cases of COVID-19 and that the Colombian government is covering it up.
column8: In two videos of a YouTube channel it is said that in Ibagué there are cases of coronavirus and that the Colombian government is covering it up. However, this information is false.

column2: New confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Kolkatta reported by Press trust of India.
column8: A clear case of misreporting done by PTI. There are no confirmed coronavirus patients in Kolkata/Confirmed both by the airport authority of Kolkatta and the Traveller

column2: Someone from Bosnia and Herzegovina was captured on the Diamond Princess cruiser in quarantine. After receiving the results of being negative on coronavirus, he returned to BiH.
column8: This man was not on the cruiser, was not quarantined and was not tested for the virus. He personally said all this for several media in the region, but later said that he was scammed by his friends.

column2: Drinking much hot water can prevent getting COVID-19.
column8: There has been no information nor evidence to suggest that drinking hot water has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

column2: Nan-shan Zhong said there is no vegetarian getting COVID-19.
column8: Nan-shan Zhong hasn't had such a comment. There is no evidence to support this claim, either.

column2: Crows are flocking to Wuhan.
column8: This video shows crows in the Chinese city of Xining -- 1,000 miles from Wuhan.

column2: A map shows hundreds of thousands of Wuhan residents (or even 5 million of them) traveling out of the city before the lockdown.
column8: The map is merely “an illustrative picture of the global air network” that shows international flight connections.

column2: A video of a Chinese epidemiologist saying that there are millions of infected.
column8: The video was longer than the version shared in Twitter. The epidemiologist said that if Chinese Government had not taken action, there would be millions of infected by coronavirus.

column2: People in Wuhan locked inside their houses trying to escape building fire.
column8: The fire was caused due to electrical wiring failure. This video is not related to COVID-19.

column2: WHO declared COVID-19 to be the abbreviation for China Outbreak Virus In December 19.
column8: WHO declared the official name of coronavirus as COVID-19, which stands for coronavirus Disease. It has been falsely claimed to be an abbreviation for China Outbreak Virus In December 19.

column2: Video of police killing COVID-19 affected people in China.
column8: The posted video was edited with three unrelated clips to falsely claim that Police with arms are killing people. The Yiwu Police have clarified that the armed Police in the video were on their duty to kill a rabid dog. And, the last clip is related to an accident.

column2: Does a sulfur dioxide pollution in Wuhan reveal that China is burning bodies of victims?
column8: The map behind the rumor is not a real-time air quality report, but a forecast based on past datas, which therefore cannot take account of alleged recent events.

column2: Residential building was set on fire in Wuhan to control spread of coronavirus.
column8: A fire broke out in a different city in China, but officials said the fire had no connection to the coronavirus outbreak.

column2: High-rise buildings have become human incinerators to combat spread of coronavirus
column8: There was no concrete evidence to prove that buildings were being burned to stop coronavirus. The Twitter authority cited in the story was not credible.

column2: This photo is a “chinese tapa”¨from a bat.
column8: False: The picture is not of a Chinese dish, but of a soup from Guam island (United States)

column2: The Windy diagram of sulfur dioxyde emission level over Wuhan indicated massive corpses burning down there.
column8: Fa-lun Gong media published several news about this topic. It also was reported or cited by the other mainstream media.

column2: Coronavirus was created in a lab in Wuhan.
column8: No scientific evidence exists to assert that the coronavirus was created in a lab. According to the WHO, “Both Chinese and external expert groups are working in trying to identify the animal source of this new virus.”

column2: Chicken Infected From coronavirus Found In Bangalore.
column8: Post claiming chicken infected from coronavirus found in Bangalore is fake. The image is old and is not related to 2019 novel coronavirus.

column2: COVID-19 was caused by 5G antennas.
column8: There is no proof that 5G network has anything to do with the outbreak of a novel coronavirus.

column2: Boiled ginger can cure cov.
column8: Doctors deny this.

column2: A video claims to show a plane carrying medical supplies to China.
column8: This video shows a plane in Kenya carrying humanitarian aid bound for China.

column2: COVID-19 means “China Outbreak Virus”.
column8: It means coronavirus disease.

column2: Satelite images show increase in SO2 emissions around Wuhan.
column8: Images were actually from a weather forecast, based on historical data and meteorological conditions. No use of real-time data.

column2: A video shows a family killed by the coronavirus amid China’s multi-city lockdown.
column8: False: The video does not show a family killed by the coronavirus amid China’s multi-city lockdown. The family was reported to have died of carbon monoxide poisoning in Dec 2019.

column2: Weed kills coronavirus.
column8: Weed doesn’t kill coronavirus. Fake post getting viral.

column2: There is a Cuban drug used in China against the coronavirus.
column8: Despite the article cited by the presidente and the Cuban embassy in China claiming that this medicine is being used by Health Secretary in China, there are no proof about it and Interferón 2B has another uses.

column2: The Chinese news website Tencent filters that there are more than 24,000 deaths from coronavirus.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Claims of cannibalism in China. People are cutting a baby in order to eat it.
column8: This actually shows an autopsy on a baby.

column2: A person with coronavirus in Calella, Barcelona (February 13th).
column8: This is denied by the health authorities.

column2: Chinese government requests the Supreme People’s Court for permission to kill 20,000 coronavirus patients to stop the spread of the disease
column8: China has not sought the permission of the country's Supreme People's Court to execute 20,000 coronavirus patients.

column2: mostly Bats responsible for the outbreak of coronavirus originated from the rooftop of a house in Wuhan.
column8: The viral video is around nine years old and is from Miami, USA.

column2: Philippines has issued an order mandating a compulsory quarantine for all travellers returning from 23 countries.
column8: Philippine authorities did not issue this warning after the novel coronavirus outbreak.

column2: USPS stops accepting items for China and HK.
column8: USPS told AFP on February 12 it would continue to accept items bound for China and Hong Kong but could temporarily not offer time guarantees on those shipments; it clarified that it will temporarily halt its transit service that ships mail from other countries to China and Hong Kong.

column2: Black people are more resistent to Cov.
column8: Dakar's Institut Pasteur denies.

column2: Partially The Pinol brand of disinfectant is the solution to the coronavirus.
column8: COVID-19 was discovered at the end of 2019 and cleaners have not proven its effectiveness against this virus.

column2: In Japan, Okinawa Prefecture Governor Tamaki Denny was seen Kachashi dancing with the mayor of Nanjo City. It was reported that “the governor and the mayor danced while the people were terrified about the new coronavirus infection.”
column8: It is true that Governor Tamaki danced Kachashi with Mayor Zukeran in January 25. But this is before a cruise ship anchored in Naha.

column2: In a voice note, a pilot greets from the airport of San José del Guaviare and says that he is in quarantine along with other people, between 18 and 22, who arrived in that city by plane and there they were diagnosed that they were infected by coronavirus.
column8: WhatsApp circulates an audio of an alleged pilot infected with the new coronavirus, but what he says is a lie. So far, there is no confirmed case in Colombia.

column2: China orders citizens to abandon/kill their pets as they can transmit coronavirus.
column8: Several state outlets have asked citizens not to abandon their pets. We also didn't find any local authorities ordering the killing of pets.

column2: Police Publicly Kill A coronavirus-Infected Woman In China.
column8: Video on social media is not related to coronavirus. The woman in the viral video was taken into custody for violating traffic restrictions in China’s Heilongjiang province.

column2: Will the coronavirus epidemic disappear in April thanks to the heat, as Donald Trump said?
column8: It's impossible to predict the evolution of this epidemi, because this coronavirus is a new virus. Weather probably plays a role, but it remains to be determined among other factors.

column2: False New coronavirus arrives in Colombia.
column8: The piece says the Wuhan coronavirus was afound in a patient in the town of Ibagué, Colombia, and shows a written diagnosis to show it. However, the image shows it to be a different sort of coronavirus.

column2: Coronavirus cases reported in Rome, Georgia
column8: The medical facility issued a statement saying there was not a confirmed case.

column2: Vitamin C and Omega prevents coronavirus.
column8: There isn't any food that can prevent coronavirus infection.

column2: “THE CHINESE HAVE BEGUN TO USE THEIR HUMAN CORPES TO PROCESS INTO PRODUCTS SUCH AS CORNED BEEF TO SHIP TO AFRICA. Please share with your contacts..Very important”
column8: The video might be of Tibet or China’s Sichuan as residents of both these territories perform such rituals. However, we haven’t found the origin of this claim hence we can not emphasize whether or not visuals in this video belong to Sky Burial. But from our findings it is evident that the video is in no way related to the coronavirus outbreak.

column2: China is seeking court’s approval to kill 20000 people positive with coronavirus
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Chinese elderly couple infected with coronavirus say goodbye while they are in a hospital.
column8: The elderly couple hospitalized for other conditions such as lung cancer and respiratory failure.

column2: Germans quarantined in La Gomera by the coronavirus leave home isolation without permission.
column8: The Ministry of Health of the Canary Islands denies they have returned to Germany.

column2: Hand sanitizer form 2010 is labeled against coronavirus 2019-nCoV.
column8: The hand sanitizer marked in 2010 was against the general coronavirus. It wasn't related with the coronavirus-nCoV.

column2: The coronavirus pandemic can be dramatically slowed, or stopped, with the immediate widespread use of high doses of vitamin C.
column8: Maintaining an adequate intake of vitamin C is important for staying healthy. However, evidence from clinical trials shows that regular vitamin C supplementation does not prevent viral respiratory tract infections such as the common cold, which can be caused by coronaviruses, in the general population. Although some studies have shown a reduced incidence of the common cold in individuals undergoing severe physical stress, such as marathon runners.

column2: Putting an onion in your room can help prevent COVID-19.
column8: No evidence that placing onions in the room has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

column2: China scientist Ms Shih generated coronavirus.
column8: A SARS-like cluster of circulating bat coronaviruses shows potential for human emergence.

column2: Hold your breath for 10 seconds. If you are able to do this, you are not infected with COVID-19.
column8: There is no evidence to support this claim. People must have a test conducted by hospitals or legitimate labs to determine the infection with COVID-19.

column2: Miles Kwok: China military admitted that Conoravirus is made by China. It is a human-made bio-weapon.
column8: Miles Kwok didn't mention nor suggest that COVID-19 is human-made bio-weapon.

column2: Was Corona Antivirus Discovered by Israeli and Chinese Doctors?
column8: Remdesivir as novel coronavirus antivirus is being carried out in collaboration with various institutions, not related to specific ethnicity or religion.

column2: 2019-nCoV is officially found in bats.
column8: The content of both The Daily Mail and Verter News did not say bats were “officially” the source of the 2019-nCoV, only that they were “likely” to be its source.

column2: Photos of a Chinese man eating “human baby soup” that circulated on social networking platforms. He is seen sitting at a table with a stillborn baby served in front of him.
column8: The photos were from a performance art show by Chinese artist Zhu Yu in 2000.

column2: Ginger can cure and protect you from COVID-19.
column8: Unable to conclude like that, even ginger may good for health, but it's no scientific proof on COVID-19 yet.

column2: Claim that the 2019 novel coronavirus (COVID-19) is more deadly than Ebola or HIV.
column8: Based on the evidence, AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. The post’s claim that coronavirus is the most deadly disease in history is not correct. Global fatalities for HIV and Ebola are far higher, figures from the World Health Organization and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention show.

column2: Chinese supreme court ok’d euthanasia of 20 000 people.
column8: The article was published on a site that has regularly produced hoax reports, and China has made no such announcement.

column2: 2 cov cases in Libreville, Gongo.
column8: Authorities denied it.

column2: Videos stating that 25,000 Chinese are being killed.
column8: Three different videos - 2 unrelated to the coronavirus and one with overlaid music wre clubbed together with false claims.

column2: Raúl Rodolfo Abhuz Khan, a biochemical engineer from Karmalah laboratories creator of the coronavirus.
column8: The Auronplay YouTube image was used in a screenshot that is being used in misinformations to "denounce" the "multi-million dollar pharmaceutical business" behind the coronavirus. First, CNN did not publish this news at any time and the man in the photo is also Raúl Álvarez (Auronplay), a famous Spanish youtuber.

column2: China seeks approval from the court to kill over 20 000 coronavirus patients.
column8: Source is not reliable and zero credible news platforms have published. There is no such a hearing in supreme court's schedule.

column2: People In Wuhan Locked inside their houses by the Chinese goverment.
column8: The video is of people in wuhan offering their respects to the whistleblower, doctor Li Wenliang.

column2: People lying on the ground in China because they got coronavirus.
column8: Video comes from South Africa during a initiation rite in a private school.

column2: Cats and dogs can be infected and can contaminate humans with COVID-19.
column8: There is no evidence that pets such as dogs or cats can be infected with the new coronavirus, say WHO and French medical experts.

column2: Cats and dogs can be infected and can contaminate humans with COVID-19.
column8: There is no evidence that pets such as dogs or cats can be infected with the new coronavirus, say WHO and French medical experts.

column2: “Breaking: UK Prepares For Full Lockdown After Hundreds Of New Cases — Wuhan Super Virus Updates.”
column8: Only about a dozen coronavirus cases have been confirmed in the United Kingdom.

column2: A chinese pirate movie called “coronavirus” is sold in Mexico City.
column8: The video is actually a 2013 South Korean film called Gamgi.

column2: Overseas Chinese bought flights to ship medical supplies from Melbourne to South China.
column8: To ship the medical supplies donated by Chinese entrepreneurs in Kenya, the Chinese airline upgraded passengers to business class and used the economic class to place all donation goods.

column2: In the Chinese city of Shandong, no one gets COVID-19 because it’s full of garlic.
column8: There is no evidence that garlic has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus. Plus, there was a confirmed case in Shandong. (Feb. 11, 2020)

column2: Russian doctor taught: washing your nostril with soap can prevent COVID-19.
column8: There is no evidence that rinsing nostril has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus. To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat COVID-19.

column2: Is Thailand Successfully Cure Corona Virus Patients with Marijuana?
column8: Antiflu and anti-HIV drugs used by doctors in Thailand to treat patients with the coronavirus do not contain cannabis.

column2: Is Chinese Government Requests Court Permission to Kill 20 Thousand Corona Virus Patients?
column8: There is no credible source that states this claim.

column2: Video shows coronavirus patients and doctors
column8: The original video is from South Africa, not China.

column2: Mostly Coronavirus-infected chicken found in Bengaluru.
column8: Viral image of sick chicken is old and not related to coronavirus.

column2: COVID-19 was stolen from Canada by Chinese spies and accidentally released in Wuhan.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Hong Kong police are misappropriating face masks for personal use.
column8: Photo circulating since 2018.

column2: This photo shows a new case in New South Wales.
column8: Local autorities denied it.

column2: Green chiratta can prevent cov.
column8: No scientific evidence for that.

column2: China officially said that the new coronavirus had “confirmed aerosol infection” and that “in short, airborne infections” was spread.
column8: Aerosol infections are rare and different from airborne infections.

column2: Satellite images showing high levels of sulphur dioxide above China are possible evidence of mass cremations of people who have died from coronavirus.
column8: False. The maps are not satellite images, and do not show actual levels of sulphur dioxide. They are simply forecasts based on historical data and weather patterns.

column2: Ecuadorean doctor saves lifes during the Wuhan crisis.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Partially Special prayer is organized by the Muslim community in China to save people from coronavirus.
column8: Viral video has got nothing to do with the recent coronavirus outbreak

column2: A case of coronavirus in Andorra.
column8: There is no case of coronavirus in Andorras (as of 10 of February).

column2: A child from China has coronavirus in Galicia (Spain)
column8: There are no children infected with coronavirus in Spain at this date.

column2: Can cannabis cure coronavirus?
column8: The image has been created with the help of a website called dopl3r. No government mandate or science research or WHO have commented on cannabis and if it can cure coronavirus or not.

column2: A person with coronavirus in Andorra (February 10th).
column8: As of February 10, there is no confirmed case of coronavirus in Andorra.

column2: Bill Gates predicted coronavirus.
column8: Bill Gates didn't predict coronavirus 2019-nCoV

column2: Bill Gates predicted coronavirus.
column8: Bill Gates didn't predict coronavirus 2019-nCoV

column2: In 2012 a Facebook user predicted coronavirus from China.
column8: The Facebook status wasn't the original one. It has been modified on the 27th of January 2020.

column2: India scientists found: HIV gene is embedded in 2019-nCov, which is China’s bio-weapon.
column8: Uncanny similarity of unique inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag》.

column2: Singapore – Hong Kong People ran into supermarket panic buying toilet paper.
column8: The video was filmed in China and was already uploaded online on October 4th, 2019.

column2: An apartment in Wuhan was on fire since the owner over-sprayed ethanol. He turned on the heat, causing an explosion.
column8: The video was filmed in Chongqing, not in Wuhan.

column2: Chinese citizens join Muslim prayers because of fear of coronavirus?
column8: The video was taken during Eid prayer at the Yiwu Mosque, China, in June 2019, before the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak occurred.

column2: The people in this video show the coronavirus patients in China?
column8: The video of initiation activities at a secondary school in South Africa.

column2: Garlic Water Can Cure Novel coronavirus.
column8: Garlic is a healthy food that may have some antimicrobial properties. However, there is no evidence from the current outbreak that eating garlic has protected people from the new coronavirus.

column2: Mostly A woman infected with coronavirus killed by Chinese police.
column8: The woman in the viral video was taken into custody for violating traffic restrictions in China’s Heilongjiang province.

column2: Coronavirus is caused by snakes.
column8: There is no conlusive proof that snakes have caused the spread of the Wuhan coronavirus.

column2: Coronavirus infected girl was admitted to Badulla Hospital in Sri Lanka.
column8: “The girl was tested negative for coronavirus, and she was administered medicines for her ailment and then discharged”.

column2: Ginger ale is an effective cure for the 2019 novel coronavirus (nCoV).
column8: The World Health Organization (WHO) said drinking traditional herbal teas is “not specifically recommended as 2019-nCoV remedies as they are not effective to protect yourself and can be even harmful.”

column2: The Department of Health (DOH) and the Bureau of Immigration (BI) “issued a lookout bulletin” for the “arrest and detention” of a Chinese man who “escaped the quarantine area” of the Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA).
column8: The BI clarified in a statement that the story of the foreigner's "escape" from NAIA's quarantine area is a hoax. Further, the DOH did not issue any advisory or bulletin about a foreigner who escaped the NAIA quarantine area.

column2: This Lysol disinfactant label says it’s tested against the new cov.
column8: Covs a a family of viruses.

column2: People were screaming in Wuhan because they feared the coronavirus.
column8: The video is actually of Wuhan residents whistling and shouting to commemorate Dr. Li Wenliang, the whistleblower of the virus who died on February 7 after getting infected.

column2: Kazakhstanis burned and smashed Chinese restaurants and homes because of the spread of coronavirus in the country.
column8: The video is real, but the text was misleading. There is no connections between pogroms and coronavirus. It was an ethnic conflict between Kazakhs and Dungans that arose on domestic grounds

column2: Coronavirus found in broiler chicken.
column8: Post claiming coronavirus found in broiler chicken is fake.

column2: Autopsy reveal Wuhan doctor was murdered in his sickbed.
column8: The story fabricates a quote and did not offer on-the-record source for its claim. It also came from a website that frequently publishes false information. Other news outlets confirmed Li Wenliang died from the coronavirus.

column2: Says the 2019 coronavirus “causes sudden death syndrome.”
column8: There is no evidence that the virus causes sudden death syndrome.

column2: Can Dettol Cleaners Kill the Corona Virus?
column8: coronavirus in question is a type of coronavirus MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV, and Human coronavirus that refers to the common cold

column2: Image of Pakistani Prime minister Imran Khan and Chinese president Xi Jinping in which Imran Khan is wearing mask.
column8: Edited image of Imran Khan and Xi Jimping viral with wrong claim.

column2: Cannibalism in China has caused the outbreak of a new strain of the novel coronavirus. A Chinese man is preparing a dead baby for consumption.
column8: No, this photo shows a piece of performance art created by a Chinese artist in 2000.

column2: Thai department of health published an infography on how to properly wear facemasks.
column8: MOH denied.

column2: This video shows the cause of cov.
column8: The video has circulated online since at least July 2011 and actually shows repairs being made to the roof of a bat-infested house in the city of Miami in the United States.

column2: This video shows cov patients in China.
column8: It's a school intiation in South Africa.

column2: The Asterix comic books and the Simpsons predicted the coronavirus outbreak.
column8: Coronavirus has been around since the 1960s while the Simpsons picture was edited.

column2: No Tencent revealed the real numbers of dead people.
column8: We have no proof the screenshot is true. However, it seems really unlikely.

column2: The coronavirus has already existed, even in domestic animals, and we have the vaccine to act against this virus.
column8: Wuhan coronavirus is not related to canine coronavirus.

column2: Taking chlorine dioxide helps against coronavirus.
column8: Taking chlorine dioxide does not help against the coronavirus or against other diseases. It is harmful.

column2: China seeks court approval to kill over 20,000 coronavirus patients to stop the spread of the outbreak.
column8: This unsubstantiated claim came from a website that published frequently false claims. There is no evidence that China went to courts looking for such approval. Claim was also debunked by several other outlets.

column2: Chinese President Xi Jinping visited mosque amid coronavirus outbreak and requested the people of the Muslim community to pray ‘in present crisis
column8: Chinese President Xi Jinping’s visit to the mosque is not related to coronavirus as the viral video is almost-four-year-old.

column2: There is a patent for the 2019-nCoV coronavirus.
column8: A post claiming that the Pirbright Institute in the UK applied for a patent for the novel coronavirus outbreak, but uses documents showing a patent from 2015 that the institute holds for avian influenza virus, which is also a coronavirus.

column2: Partially Government of the Philippines gave free masks on streets.
column8: The government of the Philippines did donate face masks to several organizations but hadn't give face mask for free on the street at least by Feb. 7, 2020.

column2: WHO announced that among many medicines, the best coronavirus killer is nicotine.
column8: WHO hasn't published such a study nor recommendation. To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat COVID-19.

column2: Doctor said: coronavirus can be alive in temperature 25-26C. Drinking hot water can help prevent it.
column8: Coronavirus can be active in temperature 25-26C. Drinking hot water does not prevent the new coronavirus disease.

column2: If you have a runny nose or cough, you don’t have COVID-19.
column8: Runny nose and dry cough are among the symptoms of COVID-19.

column2: Vietnam government gave free face masks on the streets.
column8: The film documented the charity event organized by motorcycle group, not Vietnam government.

column2: Chinese President Visits Mosque and Prayers for Corona Virus Outbreak?
column8: The video was taken in 2016, before the coronavirus was first reported in Wuhan in December 2019.

column2: Is this the Biohazard Container Discovery Photo at the American Consulate General in Wuhan?
column8: No news was found from the Xinhua news agency or other media related to the findings of the biohazard container.

column2: Weed (cannabis) cures coronavirus.
column8: In the absence of any evidence, the claim is found to be misleading.

column2: China is planning to kill coronavirus patients.
column8: A hoax website, which has been called out multiple times by various fact-checkers for spreading fake news, has published an article without any source of information to claim that China is planning to kill over 20,000 patients who have been infected by coronavirus.

column2: China is planning to kill coronavirus patients.
column8: A hoax website, which has been called out multiple times by various fact-checkers for spreading fake news, has published an article without any source of information to claim that China is planning to kill over 20,000 patients who have been infected by coronavirus.

column2: Sanitizer manufacturer Dettol knew about 2019 Novel coronavirus before it was actually reported.
column8: The label of Dettol mentioning that it kills coronavirus is not the recent strain of coronavirus. They have not tested its products for the recent noval coronavirus. Misleading post is getting viral.

column2: China has sought to kill 20,000 coronavirus patients to control the spread of the virus.
column8: No media outlet has reported it. Also, the claim originates from a rather suspicious website.

column2: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang had dinner in Wuhan during the epidemic.
column8: Photo taken in 2013 in Sichuan.

column2: The Dettol disinfectant label says the cov was tested.
column8: COv are a family of viruses

column2: Research shows that parts of the HIV genetic code have been inserted to the new coronavirus.
column8: Researchers from India indeed claim to have found HIV genetic sequences on the novel coronavirus, and speculate that it might indicate the new virus was artificially created. Nonetheless, these genetic sequences can be found in many different viruses, including some other strains of coronavirus. The paper, which was not peer reviewed, has been debunked by a wide array of researchers.

column2: Xi Jinping visits mosque for coronavirus.
column8: BOOM found that the video is from July 2016.

column2: China asks for permission to kill 20000 infected cases.
column8: The website is renowned to share misinformation. There is no evidence for China asking for the same.

column2: Coronavirus has not “hit” Ghana.
column8: While there are reports of two suspects exhibiting symptoms of the said virus, both men tested negative. This is according to Dr Asare, the Chief Executive Officer of Korle-Bu Teaching Hospital.

column2: President Xi Jinping visits Masjid to pray for the coronavirus vicitims.
column8: 2016 video of Xi Jjinping visiting a mosque is being shared in the context of the recent coronavirus outbreak.

column2: Peope behaving abnormally in China due to coronavirus.
column8: Old video clips are shared in the context of the recent coronavirus outbreak.

column2: Video of bats found under the tiles of many roofs in Hubei, China. They were the source of coronavirus.
column8: The video was not taken in China. It’s an old video uploaded on 05 July 2011 by a Miami based roofing company called ‘Istueta Roofing’. The bats in the video were found under the tiles during the process of replacing a roof for a customer in Miami (US).

column2: Coronavirus was created in laboratory in Wuhan.
column8: There is no evidence that coronavirus was created in a laboratory in Wuhan.

column2: Vitamin C stops or slows novel coronavirus.
column8: There is, to date, no known cure for coronavirus. Medical professionals and researchers also said there was no conclusive evidence to suggest Vitamin C can treat or prevent coronavirus.

column2: China is seeking court’s approval to kill all who were tested positive with coronavirus.
column8: The official website of the National Health Commission of the People’s Republic of China uploaded the daily brief on coronavirus and there was no mention of any such case there

column2: A picture of a Dettol disinfectant spray is being shared online in which the label on the back of a bottle shows the product claiming to have been proven to ‘kill coronavirus’ and that they knew about the new strain since 2019.
column8: The recent outbreak of coronavirus in China is a strain named 2019-nCoV. For this particular strain, the source of infection, animal host and reservoir are currently unknown.

column2: Ultimo (italian singer) has coronavirus.
column8: At today's date (Feb 6) in Italy we have only 2 case of coronavirus (2 Chinese citizens).

column2: Woman eats bat soup contaminated with coronavirus in China.
column8: The video was recorded on the island of Palau, Micronesia in 2016.

column2: People infected with coronavirus die in the street while doctors travel through the infection zone.
column8: Both images belong to different events. The first photo corresponds to a performance in Germany and the second photo portrays two doctors who care for Ebola sufferers in Uganda.

column2: Share this post on Facebook, you can get free face masks.
column8: Taiwan FactCheck Center has shared that post following the instruction but didn't get any feedback. The posts had been neither deleted or revised afterward.

column2: WHO Calls for Isolation of China due to the Corona Virus?
column8: WHO states that they do not recommend restrictions on travel or trade with China.

column2: Video shows an infected baby with a doctor.
column8: Video uploaded on 14th of January. There was no reported case on that time. It does not fit the COVID-19 quarantina protocol.

column2: Coronavirus Discovered In Broilers Chicken.
column8: Unrelated images of ailing chicken shared with the claim that coronavirus has been discovered in broilers chicken. The viral post is fake.

column2: A statement of a Bulgarian doctor who claims that consuming alcohol helps in curing or prevention of the new coronavirus, while the title of the original post is that alcohol is the CURE for coronavirus.
column8: The only thing the WHO claims about alcohol and the coronavirus is that an alcohol-based hand sanitizer is recommended. It is a well known fact that there is no cure for the virus. There are medications that help treat the symptoms of the virus while you wait for the immune system to fight the virus, and vaccines are the best prevention.

column2: You can’t transmit the virus to other people if you don’t feel its symptoms.
column8: It's more complicated than this, and that's why the French health minister corrected its communication on this matter.

column2: Boild garlic water can protect from Cov.
column8: Health experts refute false claims that drinking boiled garlic water cures novel coronavirus.

column2: Tinospira crispa plants can treat cov.
column8: Philippine health experts dismiss misleading online claim that tinospora crispa plants can treat novel coronavirus.

column2: Case of cov in Alberta, Canada.
column8: Authorities denied it.

column2: A case of the novel coronavirus was registered in a hospital in Maranhão.
column8: It was a different type of coronavirus, HCoV-OC43, which causes regular colds.

column2: This is a market in China where bats and snakes were served as food.
column8: The market was in Indonesia.

column2: Doctors confirm that the novel coronavirus may arrive in Brazil through AliExpress packages.
column8: There's no evidence for this claim. All specialists agree that it's very unlikely that a virus would survive more than a few hours outside a host, on a solid surface.

column2: Indian daily falsely links study to coronavirus in digital edition and then changes it.
column8: The study was linked to filoviruses and had the minimal role of Wuhan's virology institute.

column2: False “coronavirus epidemy in Poland”
column8: Article has clearly misleading, false headline that is an obvious clickbait: "Prime minister has no doubts: coronavirus epidemy in Poland". In the article itself there is no claim or statement said by any of Polish officials that could justify such alarming headline.

column2: Fake News Of coronavirus Infecting Boiler Chicken.
column8: We found the above circulated post to be False. There is no such confirmation that broiler chicken has been infected by coronavirus, the source of the disease is yet to found. The images in circulated are old and unrelated.

column2: Dettol sanitizer can kill coronavirus. The company knew about the coronavirus back in 2019.
column8: The ‘Coronavirus’ mentioned on Dettol bottle is the previous strains of coronavirus, not the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Also, Dettol manufacturer (‘RB’) has clarified that they do not yet have more details of the new virus and are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain.

column2: 2019 novel coronavirus can be cured by one bowl of freshly boiled garlic.
column8: World Health Organization (WHO) has issued a clarification that garlic may have some antimicrobial properties but there is no evidence that it can protect people from the 2019 novel coronavirus.

column2: Videos of Pigs being buried in China due to the coronavirus outbreak.
column8: The videos posted are old. They are in no way related to the recent coronavirus outbreak.

column2: Children under 8 are immune to the novel coronavirus.
column8: Official WHO reports indicate that among infected there have been children as young as 2. Malaysian press have reported that 3 coronavirus cases in Malaysia include a 2-year-old boy. Also Australia's ABC reports: Queensland confirms third coronavirus case as eight-year-old child from Wuhan, China.

column2: Health Canada has advised that by keeping the throat moist (by drinking water) can help preventing infection.
column8: There is no scientific evidence to support this. Health Canada has never suggested this method.

column2: Coronavirus is caused by bat soup.
column8: There is no evidence that eating bat-soup is the cause of coronavirus.

column2: Farts recorded by infrared temperature sensors recently installed in airports and train stations to monitor temperatures of passengers amid coronavirus outbreak can screen them all.
column8: The farts were added digitally.

column2: Rinsing your mouth with salted water will prevent coronavirus infection.
column8: The doctor's team has debunked the chain.

column2: First case of coronavirus in San Vicente del Raspeig (Alicante, Spain).
column8: The article was not published by El País and there has been no case detected in Alicante.

column2: Spain’s Health Secretary recommends not selling products from China.
column8: The Health Secretary has denied making such recommendations.

column2: The Simpsons predicted the coronavirus.
column8: The episode of The Simpsons talked about a flu from Japan, no China. Moreover, one of the photos shared was manipulated.

column2: Confirmed case of coronavirus found in Shaheen Bagh, Delhi.
column8: There have been three official cases of coronavirus in India so far. The Twitter handle's claim about the coronavirus case in Shaheen Bagh is fake and misleading.

column2: Can cow urine cure coronavirus?
column8: In our verification, we found several media reports, research reports, and advisories that talk about prevention and cure of the disease but there was no mention of cow urine and dung in these reports hence the claim made by the Hindu Mahasabha president Swami Chakrapani is ‘Misleading’.

column2:
1. Chinese Prime Minister Li Keqiang visited a mosque and seek protection to the country from coronavirus. 
2. Chinese president Xi Jinping visited a mosque in China after realizing the fact that only Allah can save China from this epidemic.
column8: The first video is of former malaysian Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi who visited a mosque in China during his visit in 2015. The second video is aslo an old one, President Xi Jinping paid a visit to the Xincheng Mosque in Yinchuan city, capital of NW China's Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region on Tuesday, July 19, 2016.

column2: Chinese PM visited mosque following coronavirus outbreak.
column8: The man in the viral video is former Malaysian Prime Minister, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi. The video was shot during his visit to China when he visited Beijing’s Nan Xia Po Mosque in July 2015.

column2: A picture show people in China fainted on the Street after they got infected of the coronavirus
column8: The pictures was actually taken in 2014 in Germany during a concentration to remember holocaust victims.

column2: 2019 novel coronavirus contains “pShuttle-SN” sequence proving laboratory origin.
column8: The pShuttle-SN vector was designed by researchers seeking to develop a potential SARS vaccine. However, the 2019 novel coronavirus does not contain a sequence from the pShuttle-SN vector as claimed. There is no evidence supporting the claim that 2019-nCoV is man-made.

column2: Label in disinfectant ensures that the new coronavirus strain is not new.
column8: The disinfectant can only eliminate other types of coronaviruses that are found on hard and non-porous surfaces. But it does not include the new strain 2019-nCoV

column2: When the first group of Japenese evacuated from Wuhan to Tokyo, each evacuee took one own ambulance.
column8: According to the Japanese media NHK, among 206 Japanese evacuees being withdrawn from Wuhan on January 29th, 199 evacuees took seven buses, and five evacuees took ambulances to the hospital for further examination.

column2: There are 40 thousand Chinese foreign workers in Morowali that are quarantined with Corona Virus?
column8: There are only 5,390 foreign workers employed at the company.

column2: Partially Chinese kill their pets due to epidemic anxiety.
column8: The photo of a dead dog was verified. Others not. There is no evidence that there is a massive pet killing in China.

column2: Weed, slang for the cannabis plant, can “kill coronavirus.”
column8: As of Tuesday, February 18, the World Health Organization (WHO) said "there is still no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat" the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV).

column2: Original publication claims that Macedonian citizens are afraid to order from AliExpress because in this way coronavirus is transmitted.
column8: According to a statement from the Post Office, the institution has received no information on further action on the coronavirus by either the Ministry of Health or the World Postal Union. And this is because the coronavirus is not transmitted by post packages. Citizens are also aware of this fact. Thus, the claim of Faktor is false.

column2: Sri Lanka eradicated coronavirus.
column8: One patient recovered but experts said its not enough to mention eradication.

column2: This photo shows a Japanese medical professional going to provide aid in Wuhan.
column8: This photo has circulated in reports about a Japanese medical team travelling to China in 2008.

column2: 300.000 people are infected in China.
column8: Fewer cases according to China.

column2: New cov comes from rhino horns.
column8: Origin is unknown and rhino horns could not hold any virus.

column2: You can steam face masks to reuse them.
column8: Experts warn against it.

column2: The Chinese Prime minister visited a mosque to gain protection for coronavirus.
column8: The video is of the then Malaysian Prime minister in 2015 visiting a mosque in Beijing.

column2: Dettol sanitizer kills coronavirus and the company knew about the existence of the virus before the outbreak of the virus in China.
column8: Dettol kills older strains of coronavirus but has not tested the new strain yet. coronavirus is a family of strains infecting mammals and humans.

column2: Broiler chickens were found to have coronavirus in Mumbai.
column8: Chickens have not been identified as the source for the coronavirus so far and the attached pictures are not linked to coronavirus.

column2: Pigs mulled in China blamed for coronavirus.
column8: The video is from the African swine flu outbreak in China in 2018-19.

column2: “Kochi Prefectural Assembly, who returned from Wuhan, refused the test, while it was infected with coronavirus”
column8: No coronavirus infection has been confirmed in Kochi Prefecture, and no tests have been carried out.

column2: Video shows pigs buried alive.
column8: This video if from January 2019.

column2: A Postobon tank in Colombia was infected with coronavirus and all sodas were contaminated.
column8: The alleged infection of a Postobón tank is false. Both the company and the Ministry of Health denied it.

column2: A Sri Lankan Girl Finding A Cure For coronavirus.
column8: From our investigation it is evident that any definitive cure or antibiotic for 2019-nCoV has not been discovered as yet. Therefore, the claims of the discovery of a drug that can cure Wuhan Virus are totally baseless.

column2: Prime Minister of China visited a mosque and realised that the only way to protect oneself from coronavirus is to bow before Allah.
column8: This Video is from an AP archive repository that was uploaded in 2015 showing ex-Malaysian Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi visiting a mosque in China which is falsely being shared as Prime Minister of China visiting a mosque during coronavirus outbreak in the country. Also as per the AP repository this event took place in the year 2004.

column2: New Confirmed Case Of coronavirus In The Macarthur Region of Australia!
column8: This story has not been reported by 7NEWS Sydney news, nor any other news outlets,(7News Sydney confirmed with us).

column2: Video of a family died due to novel coronavirus.
column8: The video was found on the internet at least since the last week of December 2019. But the first death from the novel coronavirus was reported only in the second week of January 2020.

column2: Video of Chinese Prime Minister Li Keqiang visiting a Mosque and offering prayers seeking protection to the country from coronavirus.
column8: The man in the video is not Chinese Prime Minister Li Keqiang, he is former Malaysian PM Abdullah Ahmad Badawi. The video was taken in 2015 and it shows Badawi visiting ‘Nan Xia Po’ Mosque in Beijing to offer his Friday prayers.

column2: Video from China show people fleeing from coronavirus quarantine
column8: The video footage is originally from an anti-government protest that was posted in December 2019, well before the coronavirus quarantine began.

column2: A case of novel coronavirus in Huelva (Spain).
column8: It hasn't been any case of novel coronavirus in Huelva (Spain) at 3rd of February.

column2: A neighbour of Noia (region of Galicia, Spain) has been infected with coronavirus
column8: The picture has been doctored. La Voz de Galicia hasn't published that article and ther has been no new case of coronavirus in Spain.

column2: Coronavirus is not new as there is a vaccine for dogs that prevents it
column8: Coronavirus is not new, but the current outbreak was caused by a type that was recently discovered.

column2: Coronavirus found in Broiler Chicken
column8: The pictures are outdated and have nothing to do with the coronavirus. Pictures that went viral on social media are about sick chickens.

column2: Video shows bat infestation under a tiled roof claims to be the source of coronavirus in China’s Hubei.
column8: The viral video is eight-year-old and it is not from China.

column2: There is a person with coronavirus in Galicia (February 4th).
column8: According to the Spanish Health Ministry, there is just one case of coronavirus in Spain until now. The image has been manipulated and La Voz de Galicia hasn´t published that article.

column2: There is a person with coronavirus in Huelva (February 4th)
column8: According to the Spanish Health Ministry, there is just one case of coronavirus in Spain until now. The image has been manipulated and RTVE hasn´t published that information.

column2: Is it safe to receive a letter or a package from China?
column8: According to the WHO and other experts, people receiving packages from China are not at risk of contracting.

column2: Dr Zhong Nanshan said that saline solution can kill the virus.
column8: Several Chinese media outlets debunk that fake. Moreover, experts say it is not true.

column2: Doctor fainting durying surgery to a coronavirus patient.
column8: The video was published in the Chinese social media WEIBO and it shows a fainting doctor during an open heart surgery. According to the post, the video gas recorded in a hospital of Zhotong in Yunnan, China.

column2: A doctor called Leslie Chow discovered the coronavirus and died due to contact with coronavirus patients.
column8: The portrait in the post corresponds to the American actor Ken Jeong. However, the doctor Lin Wenliang was the first to warn of the risk of coronavirus.

column2: Chinese CDC: Tea can reduce the risk of getting coronavirus.
column8: Chinese CDC hasn't published such a study nor recommendation. To date, there has been no information nor evidence to suggest that tea has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

column2: Study indicated that black tea and Pu’er tea can help to prevent coronavirus
column8: To date, there has been no information nor evidence to suggest that drinking tea has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

column2: Corona Virus Victim Secretly Cremated.
column8: The photo of the pile of boxes at Tianhe International Airport in Wuhan contains protective clothing bought by the Zall Foundation to help control the coronavirus.

column2: Corona Virus Can be Transmitted Through Sweat of Chinese Canned Food Factory Workers
column8: Transmission of the Corona Wuhan virus is only possible through close unprotected contact with sufferers, through snot or saliva splashes when sneezing and coughing.

column2: The claim that a photo shows the infected people in China.
column8: The photo is taken for the commemoration of holocaust victims in Frankfurt in 2014.

column2: Chicken causes coronavirus.
column8: There has been no official confirmation of a link between chicken and nCov - and no source for nCov has been found as yet. However, WHO has said that they are looking into animal sources to find the origin but there is no clarity on what the animal is.

column2: Alibaba Group founder Jack Ma gave US$5 million to a Filipino student who developed a vaccince for novel coronavirus.
column8: No vaccine has been developed to stop the recently discovered virus. There are also no news reports saying Jack Ma made a special separate donation to a Filipino student in China Medical University.

column2: A video of domesticated and exotic animals are being sold in a wet market in “Wuhan, China”.
column8: The video currently being spread on social media is a composite of two different clips, one of Langowan Traditional Market and the other of Tomohon Traditional Market, both in Indonesia.

column2: Japan has sent a 1000-man medical team to Wuhan.
column8: The image circulating on social media is over 11 years old, taken on May 20, 2008, of a 22-member medical team at Japan’s Narita International Airport before flying to Chengdu city in China, then been hit by an earthquake.

column2: This image is related to the coronavirus outbreak.
column8: This image has nothing to do with coronavirus.

column2: The novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) “will not spread” in the Philippines due to the country’s high temperature as well as relatively high humidity.
column8: In an email response to this claim, the World Health Organization (WHO) told Rappler that 2019-nCoV "has spread to countries with both hot and humid climates, as well as cold and dry."

column2: An Israeli spy (Dany Shoham) claims that the new coronavirus is linked to the Chinese secret program for the production of biological weapons at the Institute of Virology in Wuhan, the epicenter of the infection.
column8: On 29 January 2020, two credible media outlets, The Foreign Policy and The Washington Post deny the Washington Times' claims in their headlines. Foregn Policy says the Wuhan virus is not a laboratory bio-weapon, stressing that conspiracy theories are spreading faster than the coronavirus itself. The Washington Post has a similar headline, in which experts say that they have debunked the theory linking the emergence of coronavirus in China with the development of biological weapons.

column2: mostly Coronavirus killed 1,12,000 people and infected 28 lakh in China.
column8: Till the time of writing this article, coronavirus had killed more than 400 people and infected over 20,000 in China.

column2: There is an herbal cure for CoV.
column8: Health experts in Sri Lanka say there is no evidence asafoetida or other herbal medicine can definitively protect people from infection.

column2: A photo shows people infected lying on the sidewalk in China.
column8: It was an artistic performance in germany in 2014.

column2: Hubei district is filled with bats on their roofs which are the main source of coronavirus thus the virus spread there.
column8: The video is an 8 year old video from Miami Florida and is not linked to the coronavirus.

column2: The common flu kills 60 times more people annually than the coronavirus.
column8: It is not right to compare common flu to coronavirus because influenza is seasonal virus, we have vaccines for it and the virus is predictable whereas while this new coronavirus exists only for few months and nobody could say exactly what is mortality rate from this virus. Even compared to current information about coronavirus fatality rate, it comes much higher (around 2-3 percent) than common flu (0.01 percent).

column2: Partially 3 preliminary studies who became viral on social networks for wrong reasons.
column8: Those are 3 authentic publications, but they were either too preliminary to conclude what they were concluding, or social networks overstated their conclusions.

column2: Twitter user posts viral image suggesting that cocaine kills coronavirus.
column8: The World Health Authority has said there is no that there is currently no specific medicine to prevent or treat the new coronavirus. Moreso, relevant authorities stance is in contradiction to the viral headline.

column2: Two Italian scientists were the first in isolate the coronavirus in Europe

column2: There are cases of coronavirus in Maturín city.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: In a video that went viral on social media we see a street market in the city of Wuhan in China from where the new coronavirus 2019-nCoV began to spread.
column8: "The market seen at the video in question is located in Indonesia, not in China."

column2: Chlorine dioxide kits sold online under various names — Miracle Mineral Solution, Miracle Mineral Supplement, Master Mineral Solution — will cure coronavirus.
column8: MMS does not "cure" coronavirus and can be dangerous to your health.

column2: The new coronavirus contains HIV “insertions” and shows signs of being created in a lab.
column8: This stems from a poorly done study that was retracted. There is no evidence that the new virus was bioengineered, and every indication it came from an animal.

column2: The new coronavirus can be cured by drinking one bowl of freshly boiled garlic water.
column8: There is no known cure for the virus.There are no antiviral treatments that are recommended to prevent or treat the new coronavirus, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

column2: A video of Pigs being buried in China with is related to the coronavirus.
column8: The video showing the mass burial of pigs in China is unrelated with the recent Wuhan virus outbreak. The video is a year old and shows the mass burial of pigs after the outbreak of the African swine fever virus.

column2: A video of bat infested roof claimed to be from Hubei-china claiming it to be the source of coronavirus.
column8: This video dates back to 2011, which is almost 9 years ago. This video is from Miami, Florida, USA and has nothing to do with Novel coronavirus and China.

column2: Video of the new hospital set up by China for coronavirus patients.
column8: The video is found to exist on the internet at least since 2018. So, the claim that it shows the new hospital set up by China for coronavirus patients is FALSE.

column2: Xi Jinping has said that Chinese scientists found cure for coronavirus in cow urine.
column8: Xi Jinping did not make the statements regarding gaumutra (Cow urine) mentioned in the post.

column2: Image of coronavirus victims in China.
column8: The image is from Germany and it shows people lying down in a pedestrian zone, as part of an art project in Frankfurt, in remembrance of victims of the Katzbach Nazi concentration camp.

column2: The Korean Government took every facial mask from factorys to send masks to China.
column8: Some sellers claimed this to consumers. However, it turns out to be false.

column2: Bill Gates helped fund patent for coronavirus.
column8: The Pirbright Institute addressed the conspiracy theories and said the patents involve infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) only, and the Gates Foundation did not fund that work.

column2: Scientists from Australia create the first vaccine for novel coronavirus
column8: This website was a scam. There is no known, widely available or public vaccine for the coronavirus. The website that was taking orders was shut down.

column2: No Video in which a doctor faints whilst operating after being infected with coronavirus.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Pigs burried in china, is it because of coronavirus?
column8: The claimed video is one year old when pigs were burried in large numbers after the outbreak of african swine flu.

column2: Can garlic soup cure coronavirus?
column8: The claim is false as according to the WHO no treatment has yet been found for coronavirus. The search is still on.

column2:
More than 35 million people in China are now on a travel lockdown. More than 2700 have been sickened, and 81 have died.
Nothing happens without Allah’s permission and He is aware of all things.
column8: The shared image is not from China. This image was taken on 14 March 2014 in Frankfurt, Germany, where people lay down in a pedestrian zone as part of an art project in remembrance of the 528 victims of the Katzbach Nazi concentration camp.

column2: Can dettol kill coronavirus?
column8: The company said that coronavirus cannot be eliminated by using its liquid soap. Also, the company said that we do not know about this virus and no testing has been done at the moment.

column2: Video shows a doctor that faints while operating coronavirus because he got infected.
column8: Symptoms do not show inmediatly and accoding to Chinese media he fainted because he spent 17 hours operating.

column2: Coronavirus in Cecina (city in Tuscany, Italy).
column8: At today's date (Feb 3), there are no coronavirus cases in the city of Cecina.

column2: Coronavirus in Arezzo (city in Tuscany, Italy).
column8: At today's date (Feb 3), there are no coronavirus cases in the city of Arezzo.

column2: 27 patients with coronavirus in an hospital in Rome.
column8: At today's date (Feb 3), there are no coronavirus cases at the Umberto I hospital in Rome.

column2: This is an image of coronavirus 2019-nCoV.
column8: The image that has been shared is not a photo of the coronavirus 2019 n-CoV. It's a graphic processing.

column2: No Coronavirus 2019-nCoV is as dangerous as plague and cholera.
column8: At today's date, we are not able to consider coronavirus 2019n-CoV as dangerous as other diseases

column2: Says “the coronavirus was engineered by scientists in a lab.”
column8: There is no evidence that the coronavirus was created in a lab.

column2: Coronavirus contains “HIV insertions”.
column8: This claim is based on a study which compared extremely short protein sequences between the 2019 novel coronavirus and HIV, a practice likely to give false positives. The study’s authors also overlooked checking for potential similarities between 2019-nCoV and other organisms. As it turned out, these short protein sequences were similar to many other organisms, not just HIV, thereby refuting the claim that 2019-nCoV contains DNA from the HIV virus.

column2: Partially Wuhan Virus is leaked from Wuhan P4 lab.
column8: The argument is based on unfounded speculation and quoted from an outdated study.

column2: The video has been taken at the Wuhan market.
column8: The video was filmed in Indonesia, not Wuhan.

column2: Japanese Professor: Taiwan doesn’t need to join WHO.
column8: The man in the photo is a Japanese pornography star, Shigeo Tokuda.

column2: Garlic water can cure coronavirus.
column8: In the absence of any study or concrete proof, it is hard to claim that garlic water or any such home remedy can help cure coronavirus.

column2: Chinese Prime Minister offering namaz amid coronavirus scare.
column8: The video was uploaded in 2015 by Associated Press and it shows the former Malaysian Prime Minister visiting Beijing’s Nan Xia Po Mosque. He took part in the Friday prayers during his five-day trip to China.

column2: The religious beliefs of some Macedonian citizens are being used to disseminate panic and misinformation about the new coronavirus by manipulatively citing Russian texts for its outbreak in order to portray it as the beginning of a worldwide catastrophe.
column8: Totalitarian and authoritarian regimes around the world, both in the past and today, have often supported the dissemination of prophecy stories that foretell disasters and conspiracy theories as a means of keeping subjects in a state of constant fear. Such stories are often republished by unprofessional media not only for ideological but, above all, commercial reasons, because they attract readers’ attention.

column2: Conspiracy Outbreak of the Wuhan coronavirus is a start of a depopulation programme. This, in turn, is based on Bill and Melinda Gates foundation links to the outbreak.

column2: In surgical masks, the white filter side is supposed to be worn outside and the colored on the inside.
column8: Only the coloured side of the surgical mask is to be worn outside and N95 masks are better than these normal surgical masks.

column2: Photo of people lying on the ground is caused by coronavirus.
column8: Video is from a performance in Frankfurt in 2014

column2: This is Leslie Chow, a doctor who died in China fighting coronavirus.
column8: It's actor Ken Jeong, Leslie Chow is one of his characters.

column2: QQ accidentally showed that the real death toll is 25,000 people.
column8: Epidemiologists say that such a high death rate is impossible at this time. Also, with the inspection tool availabl on most browsers, we were able to create an exact copy of the screenshot.

column2: WHO confirmed 50 new cases in Guayaquil, in Ecuador.

column2: Misinformation / Conspiracy The bottle of Dettol mentioned the coronavirus since October of 2019 and so the company knew that there was about to be an outbreak of the virus.
column8: "The term coronavirus is an umbrella term for viruses that have specific characteristics. In the Dettol bottle we encounter the term human coronavirus in the list of microbes that this product can deal with. Human coronaviruses are 7 including the newly added 2019-nCoV, so the product did not mention the new type of human coronavirus 2019-nCoV but other members of that specific group."

column2: “The person in this Image came with the Chinese lady who was tested positive for coronavirus, fled away avoiding medical tests and is reportedly hidden in Delgoda (In Sri Lanka) area”
column8: The allegations are totally baseless and the photo had been taken from a profile of a person named Tharin Gunawardhana, an undergraduate student from the University of Moratuwa and a Srilankan national

column2: Scientists claim Wuhan coronavirus is HIV-1 engineered “super weapon”.
column8: The scientific research cited was not peer-reviewed, and the paper was withdrawn by the researchers to revise their results.There was also a note saying it was only a preliminary study.

column2: Picture of people lying on the street is being shared online with a caption that implies that the picture is related to the recent outbreak of coronavirus in China.
column8: The picture was taken in Frankfurt when people participated in an art protest to pay tribute to the lives lost in the Nazi concentration camps in 2014.

column2: Italy is the first European Union country that has been able to isolate the coronavirus.
column8: France was the first country.

column2: “When using a medical mask you’re supposed to use… white side out (this is the filter part) for when you’re not sick.”
column8: Global health agencies and medical mask producers agree that the colored side of the mask should always be worn on the outside.

column2: Clickbait / Coronavirus arrived in the Bosnia and Herzegovina.
column8: Coronavirus has not arrived in the Balkan region, the article is about a man from Serbia who is in quarantine in India.

column2: U.S. soldier stationed in Lithuania is the first confirmed case of coronavirus in the country.
column8: Please click the link to read the full article

column2: Consuming boiled ginger can cure novel coronavirus.
column8: Health experts say there is no scientific evidence boiled ginger can definitively relieve people of the viral infection, and the World Health Organisation (WHO) advised those showing symptoms to seek immediate medical help, instead of testing home remedies.

column2: “How to prevent the coronavirus (…) Drink fennel tea twice a day. Fennel tea has the same component as Tamiflu medicine, used to treat H1N1”.
column8: Fennel tea doesn't has the same component as Tamiflu and Tamiflu is not recommended by WHO to treat the new coronavirus.

column2: Garlic water prevents the novel coronavirus as proved by an old Chinese doctor.
column8: The WHO has not prescribed any methods, there is no link with the recent coronavirus.

column2: The Taiwanese flag is printed on masks to prevent Chinese from buying up.
column8: Production of the mask with the national flag started at the latest in 2019. There is no relationship with this coronavirus. Posts posted as "jokes" on Taiwanese Internet bulletin boards have spread.

column2: “Scientists found similar sequences in the coronavirus and in the HIV”
column8: There is some similarity between the new coronavirus and the proteins of HIV, this is only accidental, saying that "similar sequences can be found in many organisms."

column2: The Chinese foreign Ministry officially demanded an explanation from the United States due to the fact that containers with biohazard markings were found buried in the evacuated Consulate General in the city of Wuhan.

column2: Social media posts that implied arrested Harvard professor Charles Lieber had a connection to the new coronavirus.
column8: Lieber, a nanoscientist, was charged for lying about his participation in a Chinese recruitment program and his affiliation with a Chinese university. He is not accused of being a spy and has no connection to the new coronavirus.

column2: Image Show Dead People On The Streets Of China.
column8: The picture was taken in 2014 in Frankfurt, Germany as a tribute to the victims who lost their lives in a Nazi concentration camp. This image has nothing to do with coronavirus.

column2: Caption on YouTube: “doctor affected by the virus hospital wuhan china”.
column8: Prior instances of the video had captions, confirmed by media reports, said the video showed a doctor collapsing in Yunnan province because of overwork and hypoglycemia.

column2: People’s Daily’s official twitter handle shared an old image as newly built hospital building in Wuhan
column8: The viral image was taken from an online listing and is actually a modular apartment building.

column2: Says the coronavirus is “a MILITARY BIO-WEAPON Developed by China’s Army.”
column8: There is no evidence that the Chinese military developed the 2019 coronavirus as a bioweapon.

column2: Novel coronavirus is not a new virus.
column8: Many coronavirus strains have already been discovered, but new strains regularly emerge due to mutations. The particular coronavirus responsible for the outbreak originating in Wuhan, China, provisionally named 2019-nCoV, is a new strain that was identified by scientists after sequencing its genome.

column2: Corona Virus Can be Transmitted Through Free Fire Game and Xiaomi Mobile Phones?
column8: The 2019-nCoV virus cannot be transmitted through inanimate matter. To survive, the virus needs a host or cell that is also still alive.

column2: There are 5 Corona Virus Suspect Patients in Indonesia, one of whom died.
column8: Video of a simulation activity of handling the Wuhan coronavirus at RSUP Dr. Kariadi, Semarang on January 30, 2020 ago.

column2: A case was confirmed in Istanbul Medical School Hospital.
column8: A patient was isolated in the hospital on inspection but not diagnosis. There is no confirmed case by now in Turkey.

column2: Gates Foundation was the real agent behind the epidemic.
column8: The simulation Gates Foundation funded was based on another coronavirus in the same family.

column2: Video shows a doctor falling down due to coronavirus disease.
column8: The video is old. The doctor in the video was on the floor because some of the patient relatives punched him on the face.

column2: Japan sent a medical team composed of 1,000 personnel to Wuhan, China, the epicenter the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) outbreak.
column8: The photo was taken way back in May 2008. The medical team came from Japan to help China after the devastating Sichuan earthquake that year.

column2: The coronavirus responsible of COVID-19 is a mix of SRAS and HIV.
column8: If the symptoms of COVID-19 are partly similar with both diseases, the virus itself doesn't looks like a mix of HIV and SRAS.

column2: Penjab autorities advised not to eat goat meat for 60 days.

column2: Singapore closed a subway stattion after a case of COVID-19.

column8: Mix up with an investigation of Chinese scientist in Canada in 2019.

column2: Fennel tean can cure Cov.
column8: Doctors are not saying that.

column2: Corpses are strewn in China due to coronavirus.
column8: The image is from Frankfurt, Germany from 2014 where people lay down in a pedestrian zone as part of an art project in remembrance of the 528 victims of the "Katzback" Nazi concentration camp.

column2: The coronavirus is a “virus weapon”, as lethal as Ebola. Everyone who is infected dies.
column8: The Washington Times article does not provide any evidence. According to the CDC, the source of the new coronavirus is currently likely to be wildlife. The mortality rate is currently 2-3%. Most of the dead are elderly people or those with underlying illnesses such as diabetes.

column2: Market video where ‘the coronavirus began’, was not recorded in Wuhan but in Indonesia.

column2: Coronavirus “arrived” to Cúcuta in Colombia.

column2: Facebook user alleged coronavirus is unknown and kills in seconds.
column8: The coronavirus is not unknown nor does it kill ‘under a few seconds.’ The WHO says the virus is part of a family of viruses that includes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS-CoV). Also, fatality and severity of the disease may be determined by age and other pre-existing health conditions.

column2: Facebook page suggests a bowl of garlic cures “Wuhan’s” coronavirus.
column8: Health authorities have not recommended any particular drug for coronavirus. So, suggesting an alternative medical practice(s) such as eating a bowl of boiled garlic water is questionable.

column2: China builds a hospital in 48 hours for coronavius patients.
column8: Our fact check reveals that the newly opened hospital is an extended wing of Huanggang Central Hospital, scheduled to open in May 2020. A dedicated work force made the empty building into a fully operational hospital within two days, which was mistaken as the Huoshenshan Hospital proposed to be constructed in 6 days. Huoshenshan hospital is still under construction and is expected to open to the patients on 3rd day of February.

column2: Coronavirus hits 15% fatality rate.

The mortality rate based on a group of more than 800 patients with laboratory-confirmed infection suggests that the fatality rate is closer to 3%.
